timeline.message: refactor(validator): Update Black Duck validator to read and validate ConfigurationModels.
test: Fix tests for the validator and accumulator.

timeline.bodyText:
Rather than this being a component, we could demand it as part of a Provider's contract by having a validate() method on the Provider itself. Then it could choose where/ how to implement it.
The Provider could pass its properties and a configurationModel to a different class if necessary. That way, it is guaranteed that a new Provider would have a validator.
timeline.author: gkillough

timeline.message: refactor(validator): Add a validation method to the provider.
